title: Riot please answer my ticket
body:
I have been waiting for more that an hour now, i cannot log into my main account and im using my little brother's (this one) account to get help. I do not recieve answers from tech support, not even a single one, i already tried the ticket to get back my account twice and i get no usefull answer and when i ask for a human, the system wants me to log in to my account for that and I CANNOT LOG IN THATS MY PROBLEM
please riot i need an answer fast, i've been waiting for a long time and this isnt nice ¬¬

replies.body:
I only used this account because, in order to "request a human" after being assisted by Blitz Bot i was requested to log in, and since i cannot from my main account I though it was a good idea but didnt worked, i already summited 2 tickets to recover my account but I think it was not taken by somebody else but is rather a weird bug affecting my account in particular, as my brothers are able to log in without a problem.
I just wanted to contact a red to see if i could get any help, the message i get when i try to log says as follows : "Unable to connect to the login queue. Check server status here, if it looks good follow the guide here."
As i said, nor the tickets to "recover my account" nor changing password seemed to work, I just want to play plz :c

First off, I must mention that *account sharing* of **any kind** is not something we recommend since it often leads to losing an account or compromising its integrity.

If you were trying to *recover your account* using our [Riot Support page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us), you'll actually need to **log out of your account** so that it says "Sign In" in the top right of the page. Next, you'll want to submit a ticket using [**this specific form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) to ensure your ticket is sent to the right team and that you won't have to submit another one.

Let me know if you have any questions.
